original_title: 戦慄怪奇ファイル コワすぎ！FILE-04真相！トイレの花子さん
overview: A video recently posted shows something popping out of a closed toilet. Before the school was closed, rumors of "Hanako-san in the toilet" were whispered at the school, and now the interview team will try to confirm the truth.
title: Senritsu Kaiki File Kowasugi! File 04: The Truth! Hanako-san in the toilet
